usageInformation.usage: Rinse with 15 ml (use undiluted) for 60 sec. 2x daily after brushing. Gargle briefly, do not swallow, do not rinse. The mouth rinse is suitable for long-term use and should always be used in addition to daily mouth and teeth cleaning. For adults and children from 12 years of age.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Help protect your mouth from bleeding gums and bad breath with meridol Gum Protection & Fresh Breath Mouthwash. This gum mouthwash has been developed with a special 2-fold active formula with zinc that gently combats the causes of bleeding gums and bad breath. The formula in this mouthwash not only neutralises the bacteria that cause bleeding gums and bad breath, but also reduces the formation of new bacteria. As a result, the gum mouthwash supports the natural regeneration of your gums and protects you from bad breath for 12 hours. The formula of this mouthwash for gums not only inhibits the formation of bacteria to prevent gingivitis, but also activates the rapid distribution of the active ingredients in the oral cavity so that they can work immediately. It eliminates bad breath-causing bacteria on teeth and tongue and neutralises bad breath immediately. In addition, this bad breath mouthwash effectively protects against plaque build-up, gingivitis, bleeding gums, receding gums, periodontitis, tooth decay, bad breath-causing bacteria and bad breath. Its daily use helps to maintain the natural balance of the oral flora. Enjoy gentle, effective care for your teeth, gums and breath with meridol Gum Protection & Fresh Breath Mouthwash.
